subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety of the United States dominated his rivals Saturday to clinch a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom, defeating Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway by more than a second in Val d’Isère in the French Alps.
snippet: Ted Ligety of the United States dominated his rivals Saturday to clinch a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom, defeating Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway by more than a second in Val d’Isère in the French Alps.
